name: The Missing Piece (Splyze)
description:
The Missing Piece is a 2D Platformer puzzle game that puts heavy emphasis on non-standard divergent usage of the games’ physics system to solve challenges. 

This game was created as an experimental prototype, the goal is to complete all the levels with as low a score as possible (think golf). Each item you build costs you points. 

In order to excel at this game you will have to try and try again to use, abuse, and straight up destroy the intended way of playing the puzzles. 

Best of luck!
